name: War of the Visions: Final Fantasy Brave Exvius
storyline:
Leonis, a small kingdom surrounded by powerful nations, has remained unconquered with the help of a curious ring bestowed upon its king by the "Winged One."

With visions—the hopes and dreams of
legendary warriors given life—on their side,
Leonis could hold its own against the might of other kingdoms.

But as the ever-repeating cruelty of fate would have it,
even the bonds of love and friendship cannot remain unscathed.

The twin princes of Leonis,
Mont and Sterne are no exception.

Their feud signals the beginning of the end of the longstanding War of the Visions.

In this war-torn land of rivaling nations,
who will be left smiling
in the dazzling light of the Crystal?
summary:
War of the Visions: Final Fantasy Brave Exvius is a tactical role playing game that takes place on the continent of Ardra on the world of Lapis. Summon units and level up characters to unlock new abilities .

"In this war-torn world with sword in hand for what would you fight - what would you protect ? The Visions are with the ring..."
